title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Brookfield Place is a holiday oasis for shopping, dining and more in downtown Manhattan
items.description: The mixed-use complex has luxury retail shops, over a dozen restaurants and cafes, a public plaza and waterfront access, among other amenities.

items.title: Keep calm and carry on: The best carry-on luggage for every kind of trip
items.description: We rounded up the best carry-on luggage of the year, including bags from Away, Monos, July and Rimowa.

items.title: 6 ways to maximize the Chase Sapphire Preferred as a beginner
items.description: Discover six beginner-friendly ways to maximize the Chase Sapphire Preferred, from earning points to using travel perks and redeeming rewards.

items.title: Alaska Airlines adds 7 new routes, fortifies its turf in the Pacific Northwest and Alaska
items.description: Alaska Airlines is fortifying its leading position in Anchorage and Portland with seven new routes next summer.

items.title: American Airlines adds new US airport, plans 16-route expansion covering 20 cities in 2026
items.description: American Airlines is adding 16 domestic routes to outdoor-centric destinations and a handful of U.S. cities with little air service.
